pullRequest.title: Bugfix/control samesite for cookies
pullRequest.bodyText:
#1458
Checklist

 the [contributor license agreement] is signed
 commit message follows [commit guidelines]
 screenshots are included showing significant UI changes

Description of change
Create a new filter to add the SameSite attribute and secure flag to JSESSIONID cookie.

nodes.bodyText: We don't use the Logger any more, so can remove these two lines.
